price: When he reached his full strength and maturity, We gave him wisdom and knowledge. This is how We reward those who do good.
arabic: وَلَمَّا بَلَغَ أَشُدَّهُۥ وَٱسۡتَوَىٰٓ ءَاتَيۡنَٰهُ حُكۡمٗا وَعِلۡمٗاۚ وَكَذَٰلِكَ نَجۡزِي ٱلۡمُحۡسِنِينَ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
